entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning before morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1 with temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1 with temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low.
